sergio.name: Sergio Beltrán
sergio.intro: With over a decade of experience in the technology industry, Sergio brings a wealth of knowledge in cloud technologies, data science, and data engineering.

aws.title: ML Strategy Specialist Solution Architect at Amazon Web Services
aws.description: Guided major AWS customers in developing their machine learning journeys and led multi-customer events across Latin America, the USA, and Europe.

datavail.title: AWS Developer at Datavail
datavail.description: Leading data projects involving AWS Redshift, SageMaker, Databricks, and IoT solutions for enterprise clients.

vozip.title: Data Scientist at Vozip Store SAS
vozip.description: Performed exploratory data analysis and built data pipelines for customer churn prediction and forecasting.

intelbras.title: Data Analyst at Intelbras
intelbras.description: Created and maintained dashboards for sales leaders and provided technical assistance.

quadritech.title: Data Engineer at Quadritech
quadritech.description: Developed IoT solutions and full-stack applications using Python and AWS services.

education.title: Education
education.degree: Bachelor's degree in Mechatronics Engineering from Universidad Autónoma de Bucaramanga

leadership.title: Leadership & Innovation
leadership.leadership1: Led the LATAM AI/ML Area of Depth (AoD) at AWS
leadership.leadership2: Headed the AWS Partner Program Blackbelt
leadership.leadership3: Expert in MLOps frameworks and AWS Solutions Architecture
